span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 服从的，顺从的： submissive to the restraint or command of authority
【例】 that girl is so obedient that she does everything the first time she is asked 这个妹子如此顺从，叫她做事随叫随到
【近】 amenable, tractable, compliant, submissive
【反】 contumacious, imperial, balky, contrary, contumacious, defiant, disobedient, froward, incompliant, insubordinate, intractable, noncompliant, obstreperous, rebel, rebellious, recalcitrant, refractory, restive, unamenable, ungovernable, unruly, untoward, wayward, willful 顽固的，不服从的
【记】 源自obey
